<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Instance Actions</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/backend/api/openstack/instances/{instance_id}/actions"}></MethodEndpoint>



**Host**: https://core.ocplanet.cloud

Retrieve a list of actions available for the specified instance.
